Download

The latest XML Security Library version is 0.0.7:
  • source archive
  • rpm package (compiled with OpenSSL 0.9.6 because there are no OpenSSL 0.9.7 RPM yet; has incomplete XML Encryption functionality).
  • rpm-devel package (compiled with OpenSSL 0.9.6 because there are no OpenSSL 0.9.7 RPM yet; has incomplete XML Encryption functionality).
The daily snapshots and previous versions are also available.

Igor Zlatkovic provides Windows binaries for XMLSec library (as well as LibXML2, LibXSLT and OpenSSL).

Mirrors

  • XMLSoft.org
  • RPMFind.net

Requirements

The XML Security Library requires

  • LibXML version 2.4.23 or geater
  • LibXSLT 1.0.19 or greater (optional)
  • OpenSSL version 0.9.7 (prefered) or OpenSSL version 0.9.6c

Installation (source archive)

All steps are usual:

gunzip -c xmlsec-xxx.tar.gz | tar xvf -
cd xmlsec-xxxx
./configure --help
./configure [possible options]
make
make install
make check
The last step is optional and requires Internet connection to execute some tests.

CVS

XML Security Library is also available from the Gnome CVS (the module name is xmlsec). The online source browser: Gnome CVS base . 

Aleksey Sanin
